page.title: 20Recreation.
page.content: Sywell people spend some of their leisure time at the local pub and motel but many prefer sporting activities: football, cricket, squash, tennis, golf shooting (at the Range), sailing at the nearby reservoir and fishing. Keep Fit and Yoga classes are held at the local primary school. Flower arranging is also taught at evening classes at the school. Other adults attend classes at Nene College and Moulton Comprehensive School. Most people in Sywell enjoy at least one holiday a year. Many travel abroad: by car to the Continent, by plane to the Mediterranean and the odd person to U.S.A. and Canada. Caravanning and camping are popular both in this country and abroad. As most people have cars, this is the most usual form of transport. Coach and train travel to London is common.
